attributes.action: Stop the impending term time fines
attributes.additional_details: I want them to listen to the average family, families that can’t afford to pay triple the price for the same break just because it’s during term time, I want you to give parents some leaway let them have 5days a year they can be granted a holiday form that is accepted so they can take there children away, to have a break from everyday life, to have life experiences that you can’t get in a classroom, sometimes this is all people have to look forward to in their lives, more will end up depressed
attributes.background: realise not everyone can afford to take their children away in school holidays because of how ridiculous the prices are as you know there’s a cost of living crisis imagine being that family that never goes on holiday because they can’t afford the fines or the extortionate prices why take happiness

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/658365
